AI Description: SPAdes Overlap-Layout-Consensus (SPOA) is a C++ library and command-line tool for sequence alignment using a partial order graph (POG). It provides an efficient way to align long error-prone reads (such as Nanopore or PacBio) by constructing a graph based on input sequences and then finding the optimal alignment through a dynamic programming algorithm.
Core Features: Sequence Alignment Using Partial Order Graph (Pog), Efficient Alignment Of Long Error-Prone Reads, Dynamic Programming Algorithm For Optimal Alignment
General Tags: Sequence Alignment, Bioinformatics, Long Reads, Graph Based Alignment
